subdisciplines.name: Social Media
subdisciplines.description: The study of communication through social media platforms.

subdisciplines.name: Mobile Communication
subdisciplines.description: The study of communication through mobile devices, apps, and other technologies.

subdisciplines.name: Digital Marketing
subdisciplines.description: The study of marketing techniques for the digital age, including SEO, SEM, and content creation.

subdisciplines.name: Online Communities
subdisciplines.description: The study of social, political, or business groups that interact through digital media platforms such as forums, blogs, and wikis.

subdisciplines.name: Cybersecurity
subdisciplines.description: The study of protecting computer systems and networks from attacks.
